title: 5 Colossal Bible Contradictions Explained | Unapologetic Episode 18
itunes:title: 5 Colossal Bible Contradictions Explained | Unapologetic Episode 18
description: Are there contradictions in the Bible? Bobby explains the difference between an apparent contradiction and a real one. Next, we want to look at 5 apparent contradictions in the scripture and, in doing so, want to demonstrate a process or method for people to use if they encounter others.
